homeData.h3: We got the most expressy burgers on the market!
homeData.p1: Have you ever had the urge to go get burgers at Midnight? We can help! Just order 3 hours before then when we're still open!
homeData.p2: Express Burgers offers the best selection of Burgers, High Quality Drinks, and All you can eat desserts for the cost of however much you order!

directionsData.location: We're located at 300-398 Cottage Ave S

aboutUsData.aboutUs: We are just a group of students who had to make a website that sold things on a lot of new technology that we kinda just had to mess around with!
